nodes.bodyText: I don't think we can remove this throw because it breaks the API
Hmm, It did not fail the api checks......

https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se7/html/jls-13.html#jls-13.4.21
13.4.21. Method and Constructor Throws
Changes to the throws clause of methods or constructors do not break compatibility with pre-existing binaries; these clauses are checked only at compile time.
Same: I don't think we can remove this throw because it breaks the API
Hmm, It did not fail the api checks......

https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se7/html/jls-13.html#jls-13.4.21
13.4.21. Method and Constructor Throws
Changes to the throws clause of methods or constructors do not break compatibility with pre-existing binaries; these clauses are checked only at compile time.
